modules.description: This module implements a block device interface with support for encryption, providing operations to connect to a device, read and write sectors, and disconnect. It works with `Cstruct.t` buffers and 64-bit integers for sector addressing, handling errors via dedicated result types. Concrete use cases include secure storage access with decryption and interaction with MirageOS block devices.

This module implements a block device interface with encryption support, offering operations to connect to a device, read and write sectors using `Cstruct.t` buffers, and disconnect securely. It uses 64-bit integers for sector addressing and returns results in dedicated error-handling types. It is used for secure storage access with on-the-fly decryption and integrates with MirageOS block devices for virtualized storage operations.
